short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks YouTube videos containing specific keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block unwanted content on YouTube effortlessly with this extension!

Tired of seeing videos related to topics you're not interested in?

- Helps with productivity
- Change your recommended page
- Hide unwanted videos
- Easy to use

This simple tool lets you specify keywords to block, ensuring a more tailored browsing experience.

Say goodbye to irrelevant videos cluttering up your feed!

Customize your YouTube experience and enjoy a more focused viewing session.
